Digital Data Capture

Source: vignettes/forms.Rmd
forms.Rmd

This vignette provides background and transparency for the digital data capture of burn grading surveys.

Creating the data capture form

  • Design form in ODK Build
  • The OzCBI burn grading form is included in three versions in this package:
    • ODK Build save file (resume form design from this file): system.file("odk/BurnGrading01.odkbuild", package = "rOzCBI")
    • XForm (upload to ODK Central): system.file("odk/BurnGrading01.xml", package = "rOzCBI")
    • XlsForm (can edit by hand and add embedded media): system.file("odk/BurnGrading01.xlsx", package = "rOzCBI")
  • Deploy Xform (or XlsForm) to an ODK Central server, e.g. the DBCA ODK Central server

Setting up a data capture device

  • Install ODK Collect from Google Play onto an Android tablet and from Admin settings > Import settings, scan the QR code shown here. This configures the tablet to our DBCA server.
  • “Delete saved form” > “Blank forms” > delete older form versions.
  • “Get blank form” and select the form “Burn Grading”.
  • Adjust settings to taste - auto-upload data in WiFi, optimise camera resolution between clarity and file size.

Capture data

  • Follow the protocol on how to collect data.
  • Consult the ODK Collect user guide on how to use the app in general.
  • Nitpick: Aim to take all photos in landscape orientation (turn tablet sideways), as this displays nicer on computer screens and in documents.

Upload data

  • Adjust ODK Collect settings to auto-upload data where WiFi is available.
  • Bring the tablets into an area with WiFi.

Contents

  • Upload data
